en: Narrator: Peppa and George are at the playground with their friends.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治和朋友们在游乐场。

en: Narrator: Candy Cat and Pedro Pony are on the climbing frame.
cn: 旁白：糖果猫和佩德罗小马在爬架上。

en: Suzy Sheep: Whee!
Narrator: Suzy Sheep, Danny Dog and Rebecca Rabbit are playing on the slide.
cn: 旁白：苏茜羊、丹尼狗和丽贝卡兔在玩滑梯。

en: Danny Dog: Whee!
Rebecca Rabbit: Whee!
Suzy Sheep: Whee!
Danny Dog: Whee!
Rebecca Rabbit: Whee!
Narrator: Peppa is playing on the swing.
Peppa Pig: Mummy, Mummy, push me please.
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，妈妈，推我一下。

en: Mummy Pig: Are you ready?
Peppa Pig: Yes, I want to go really high.
cn: 小猪佩奇：好了，我想荡得很高。

en: Peppa Pig: Whee!
Peppa Pig: Higher, Mummy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：再高一点，妈妈。

en: Peppa Pig: Whee!
Narrator: George wants to play on the swing.
Peppa Pig: Now it’s your turn, George.
cn: 小猪佩奇：现在轮到你了，乔治。

en: Mummy Pig: Hold tight.
Peppa Pig: I want to push George.
Mummy Pig: Push George gently, Peppa.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，轻轻地推乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, Mummy.
Peppa Pig: Hold tight, George.
Peppa Pig: Whee!
Narrator: Oh, dear. Peppa has pushed George too high.
cn: 旁白：哎呀，佩奇把乔治推得太高了。

en: Narrator: George does not like being up high.
cn: 旁白：乔治不喜欢在高处。

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa, you know George is a bit scared of heights.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，你知道乔治有点怕高。

en: Peppa Pig: Sorry, George.
Peppa Pig: Let’s play on the climbing frame.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我们去玩爬架吧。

en: Peppa Pig: Hello, Suzy. Hello, Danny.
cn: 小猪佩奇：你好，苏茜。你好，丹尼。

en: Suzy Sheep and Danny Dog: Hello, Peppa.
cn: 苏茜羊和丹尼狗：你好，佩奇。

en: Suzy Sheep: Whee!
Danny Dog: Whee!
Peppa Pig: You are doing it all wrong. This is the proper way to swing across.
cn: 小猪佩奇：你们做错了，应该这样荡过去。

en: Peppa Pig: Stand back.
Peppa Pig: Ready, steady, go!
Peppa Pig: Whee!
Peppa Pig: Look at me. I’m flying like a bird.
cn: 小猪佩奇：看我，我像小鸟一样飞起来了。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh, I can’t get out.
cn: 小猪佩奇：哦，我出不来了。

en: Narrator: Peppa is stuck in the tyre.
cn: 旁白：佩奇卡在轮胎里了。

en: Peppa Pig: It’s not funny.
Daddy Pig: Well it does look a bit funny.
cn: 猪爸爸：不过看起来确实有点好笑。

en: Daddy Pig: We’ll have to pull you out.
cn: 猪爸爸：我们得把你拉出来。

en: Narrator: Peppa’s friends are helping to free her.
cn: 旁白：佩奇的朋友们在帮她脱困。

en: Peppa’s friends: Hurrah!
Peppa Pig: Thank you, everyone.
Daddy Pig: George, do you want to play on the climbing frame?
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治，你想玩爬架吗？

en: Narrator: The climbing frame is quite high. George does not like being up high.
cn: 旁白：爬架很高，乔治不喜欢在高处。

en: Daddy Pig: Sorry, George. Let’s play on the slide.
cn: 猪爸爸：对不起，乔治，我们去玩滑梯吧。

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, the slide.
Narrator: Peppa loves the slide.
Narrator: Everyone loves the slide.
Peppa Pig: Mummy, Daddy, look at me.
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，爸爸，看我。

en: Peppa Pig: Ready, steady, go.
Peppa Pig: Whee!
Suzy Sheep: Whee!
Danny Dog: Whee!
Candy Cat: Whee!
Rebecca Rabbit: Whee!
Pedro Pony: Whee!
Narrator: George wants to play on the slide.
Daddy Pig: Are you sure, George? It is a bit high.
cn: 猪爸爸：你确定吗，乔治？有点高哦。

en: Daddy Pig: All right. I’ll help you up the steps.
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧，我帮你上台阶。

en: Narrator: Oh, dear. It is a bit too high for George.
cn: 旁白：哎呀，对乔治来说还是有点高。

en: Daddy Pig: Don’t worry, George. I’ll slide down with you.
cn: 猪爸爸：别担心，乔治，我和你一起滑下去。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, you’re too big to go down the slide.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，你太大了，不能滑滑梯。

en: Daddy Pig: Don’t be silly, Peppa. I’m not too big.
cn: 猪爸爸：别傻了，佩奇，我不大。

en: Daddy Pig: Stand back. Ready, steady, go.
cn: 猪爸爸：让开，准备，预备，走。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig is stuck.
Daddy Pig: It’s not funny.
Peppa Pig: It looks very funny, Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，看起来真的很好笑。

en: Daddy Pig: Hmmm. I suppose it is a bit funny.
cn: 猪爸爸：嗯，我觉得确实有点好笑。

en: Peppa Pig: We’ll have to push you down.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我们得把你推下去。

en: Peppa Pig: Whee!
Peppa Pig: Daddy’s tummy is just like a bouncy castle.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸的肚子就像弹跳城堡。

en: Narrator: George loves bouncing on Daddy’s tummy.
cn: 旁白：乔治喜欢在爸爸肚子上跳。

en: Narrator: George isn’t afraid of heights anymore.
cn: 旁白：乔治再也不怕高了。
